name: tachyons-borders
description: Performance-first css module for styling borders.

scripts.start: tachyons src/tachyons-borders.css > css/tachyons-borders.css && tachyons src/tachyons-borders.css --minify > css/tachyons-borders.min.css && tachyons src/tachyons-borders.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
